00068 /* main content */
00069 /* SERIAL SUBSCRIPTION LIST */
00070 // callback function
00071 $count = 1;
00072 function subscriptionDetail($obj_db, $array_data)
00073 {
00074     global $can_read, $can_write, $count;
00075     $_output = '<div style="float: left;"><strong style="font-size: 120%;"><a href="#" title="Edit Bibliographic Data" onclick="openWin(\''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/pop_biblio.php?action=detail&inPopUp=true&itemID='.$array_data[0].'&itemCollID=0\', \'popSerialBiblio\', 600, 400, true)">'.$array_data[1].'</a></strong> ('.$array_data[2].')</div>';
00076     if ($can_read AND $can_write) {
00077         $_output .= ' <a href="#" class="addSubscription" onclick="javascript: $(\'subscriptionListCont'.$count.'\').show(); setIframeContent(\'subscriptionList'.$count.'\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'serial_control/subscription.php?biblioID='.$array_data[0].'&action=detail\');" title="'.__('Add New Subscription').'">&nbsp;</a> ';
00078     }
00079     $_output .= ' <a href="#" class="viewSubscription" onclick="$(\'subscriptionListCont'.$count.'\').show(); setIframeContent(\'subscriptionList'.$count.'\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'serial_control/subscription.php?biblioID='.$array_data[0].'\');" title="'.__('View Subscriptions').'">&nbsp;</a> ';
00080     $_output .= '<div id="subscriptionListCont'.$count.'" style="clear: both; display: none;">';
00081     $_output .= '<div><a href="#" style="font-weight: bold; color: red;" title="Close Box" onclick="$(\'subscriptionListCont'.$count.'\').hide()">'.__('CLOSE').'</a></div>';
00082     $_output .= '<iframe id="subscriptionList'.$count.'" src="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'serial_control/subscription.php?biblioID='.$array_data[0].'" style="width: 100%; height: 270px;"></iframe>';
00083     $_output .= '</div>';
00084     $count++;
00085     return $_output;
00086 }
00087 // create datagrid
00088 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00089 $datagrid->setSQLColumn('b.biblio_id', 'b.title AS \''.__('Serial Title').'\'',
00090     'fr.frequency AS \'Frequency\'');
00091 $datagrid->invisible_fields = array(0, 2);
00092 $datagrid->modifyColumnContent(1, 'callback{subscriptionDetail}');
00093 $datagrid->setSQLorder('b.last_update DESC');
00094 // table alias and field relation
00095 $tables['bsub'] = array('title', 'isbn_issn');
00096 $tables['mt'] = array('topic');
00097 if (isset($_GET['field']) AND !empty($_GET['field'])) {
00098     foreach ($tables as $table_alias=>$fields) {
00099         if (!in_array($_GET['field'], $fields)) {
00100             // remove unneeded array
00101             unset($tables[$table_alias]);
00102         }
00103     }
00104     // check if fields array is empty to prevent SQL error
00105     if (!$tables) {
00106         $tables['bsub'] = array('title', 'isbn_issn');
00107         $tables['mt'] = array('topic');
00108     }
00109 }
00110 // set default criteria
00111 $criteria = 'bsub.frequency_id>0';
00112 // is there any search
00113 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00114     $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00115     $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00116     if (count($words) > 1) {
00117         $concat_sql = ' (';
00118         foreach ($words as $word) {
00119             $concat_sql .= '(';
00120             foreach ($tables as $table_alias => $fields) {
00121                 foreach ($fields as $field) {
00122                     $concat_sql .= $table_alias.'.'.$field." LIKE '%$word%' OR ";
00123                 }
00124             }
00125             // remove the last OR
00126             $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -4);
00127             $concat_sql .= ') AND';
00128         }
00129         // remove the last AND
00130         $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00131         $concat_sql .= ') ';
00132         $criteria = $concat_sql;
00133     } else {
00134         $concat_sql = '';
00135         foreach ($tables as $table_alias => $fields) {
00136             foreach ($fields as $field) {
00137                 $concat_sql .= $table_alias.'.'.$field." LIKE '%$keyword%' OR ";
00138             }
00139         }
00140         // remove the last OR
00141         $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -4);
00142         $criteria = $concat_sql;
00143     }
00144 }
00145 // subquery/view string
00146 $subquery_str = '(SELECT DISTINCT bsub.biblio_id, bsub.title, bsub.frequency_id, bsub.last_update FROM biblio AS bsub
00147     LEFT JOIN biblio_topic AS bt ON bsub.biblio_id = bt.biblio_id
00148     LEFT JOIN mst_topic AS mt ON bt.topic_id = mt.topic_id WHERE '.$criteria.')';
00149 // table spec
00150 $table_spec = $subquery_str.' AS b
00151     LEFT JOIN mst_frequency AS fr ON b.frequency_id=fr.frequency_id';
00152 // set table and table header attributes
00153 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00154 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00155 // put the result into variables
00156 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, false);
00157 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00158     $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00159     echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00160 }
00161 echo $datagrid_result;
00162 /* main content end */
00163 ?>
